ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, werewolfs? Full moon? Lina? Hmmmm....

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 5:52 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kithicor

From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Mon, 12 Jul 1999, Elijah Meeker wrote:
>
> The behaviors of Ged and Luna??? (I forget her exact name
> BUT we all believe it is not accidental that she has the
> moon reference in her name). We are quite sure they are
